alert.note: Alert for Lower Columbia Basin of Washington (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 26 at 4:17AM PST until December 27 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain. Total ice accumulation between a few hundredths and 0.10 inches. * WHERE...Lower Columbia Basin of Washington. * WHEN...Until 4 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact Interstate 82 and US-395 corridors.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1, or by visiting online at https://tripcheck.com for Oregon or https://wsdot.com/travel for Washington.
